item.title: Journal des Missions évangéliques, huitième année, 4° Livraison, 15 April 1833
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of the French missionary periodical 'Journal des Missions évangéliques', 8 (1833), no. 4. Later numbers were bound together in single-year volumes.]
